document.full_text: new york yankees designated hitter jorge posada withdrew from the lineup an hour before the team's 6-0 loss to the boston red sox on saturday after being dropped to the ninth spot in the batting order.
document.title: controversy swirls as posada vacates yankees lineup
lines_and_colors: new york yankees designated hitter jorge posada withdrew from the lineup an hour before the team's 6-0 loss to the boston red sox on saturday after being dropped to the ninth spot in the batting order.
